name: CPImageSet
desc: Light and dark representations of an image.

items.name: init(lightContentImage: UIImage, darkContentImage: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates an image set with light and dark versions of an image.

items.name: var lightContentImage: UIImage
items.desc: The image the system displays when the user interface style is light.

items.name: var darkContentImage: UIImage
items.desc: The image the system displays when the user interface style is dark.
